function.name: upload_legal_document
function.description: Upload a generated legal document to Google Drive. Supports organizing documents by case/docket number. Returns shareable link for the uploaded file.

document_id.description: ID of the document to upload

document_url.description: Alternative: URL of the document to upload

file_path.description: Alternative: Local file path of the document to upload

folder_name.description: Name of the folder to upload to (will be created if doesn't exist)

docket_number.description: Court docket number - used to organize files by case

client_name.description: Client name - used for folder organization

make_public.description: Whether to make the file publicly accessible via link

web_view_link.description: URL to view the file in Google Drive

folder_id.description: Google Drive folder ID where file was uploaded
